The aim of this Report is to perform summary statistics and some of the top level analysis for droplect based single-cell RNA-seq. The report is ran after kallistobus pipeline, part of the scflow workflow.

For information on hown to run this report please refer to the main documentation of the pipeline [here](https://single-cell.readthedocs.io/en/latest/pipelines/Singlenuclei.html)
